name: Blue's Clues Blues
description:
Play as Steven from Blue's Clues as you have to desperately find more and more clues to satisfy Blue in this mock cookie clicker with a horrifying twist to the beloved children's TV show. Now download and click away as Blue demands more clues!

Click on the buttons to get more clues and more subjects for Blue to rule over and extract more clues from. The top left file menu can also be used to restart or quit the game as well as to speed things up if you don't have the time to grind away for more clues.

Download the zip file, unzip the file, and click on the application .exe file to play
